categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Eben was a male Human Colonel of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Empire. In 3643 BBY he was stationed on Balmorra, where he requested supply vehicles from Major Bessiker.
Colonel Eben appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Balmorra.
